item.description:
Workshop for those Transitioning in Relationships of all kinds! There are A LOT of unexpected changes going on these days as the veil thins and we begin to shift our frequencies - learn how to clear your energy field as you shed relationships that are no longer aligned. Partners in Passion with Author & Expert on the Human Energy Field

David Price Francis -

Join us for this interactive workshop focused on cleaning and clearing energy fields specific to relationships that will assist with enhancing the energies of new relationships during this life altering planetary shift.

 
• See and feel the human energy field for yourself
• Clear, clean and charge your personal energetic space
• Boost your electro-immune system
• Enhance the quality of your relationships
• Power your astral body

Three Hour Workshop 6:30-9:30pm
$45 if you register before the workshop; $55 at the door. Click here to register.

David is available for private consults on Sunday, May 8th @ Alchemy. Book a session and join us for our Mother's Day Brunch!!!
item.why: it is time to bring in the new! Following in the energy of the new moon...it is time to start fresh and call in what we want in all aspects of our lives!
item.name: Energetic Relationship Clearing Workshop
